content: The "Telegram Token Airdrop and Referral Bot Application" allow owner of a new token or existing token to create awareness about his cryptocurrency project. The bot reward user with a specific token, when the user perform a task and when the user refer other people to perform the same task.https://i.imgur.com/Euvq6PE.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/v2yxHHK.pngBot Live VideoThe bot application is easy to setup.You have full control over the application cause you can get your own bot token free of charge from telegram bot father.Modifications or extra features are possible at the request of the client.Contact us emailContact us telegram
